keywords: ['low quality recording', 'amateur recording', 'percussion', 'tribal beat', 'tribal music', 'female voices', 'no other instruments', 'male backing voices', 'celebration music', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This audio sample features tribal music played using only percussion and voices. There are no other instruments. The percussion is played by hand and has a tribal feel. The female voices sing in a foreign language. There are fills sung by male voices in harmony. The feel of the song is one of celebration. The tempo of the song is moderate. This is an amateur recording.
